ISSUE.TITLE: Plugins page. Rename "Is enabled" to "Enabled"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to the "Local plugins" page 2. It has two locales - "Installed" and "Is enabled". Let's make them consistent

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5015 Further changes to fix the typo in resources

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Plugins page. Rename "Is enabled" to "Enabled" #4775 (#4960) * Fixed typo in Configure.cshtml view Fixed typo in Configure view * Rename resource value Co-authored-by: Maksym Badii <Maksym.Badii@arrowdigital.com> Co-authored-by: Maksym Badii <maksym.badii@pwc.com>
#4775 Further changes to rename "Is enabled" to "Enabled" on plugins page
